blogPost.excerpt: Product management can seem like a daunting discipline, but once you get a grasp of the fundamentals, and combine that with some intuition, you’ll be on your way to leading successful projects.
blogPost.body: Product management can seem like a daunting discipline, but once you get a grasp of the fundamentals, and combine that with some intuition, you’ll be on your way to leading successful projects.
blogPost.title: Product Manager's Guide - A product manager guide from product vision to product road
blogPost.author: @Being Pavan Kumar

localize.description: 产品管理似乎是一门令人望而生畏的学科，但一旦你掌握了基本原理，再结合一些直觉，你就会走上成功领导项目的道路。
localize.tagline: 从产品愿景到产品之路的产品经理指南。

localize.description: 產品管理似乎是一門令人望而生畏的學科，但一旦你掌握了基本原理，再結合一些直覺，你就會走上成功領導項目的道路。
localize.tagline: 從產品願景到產品之路的產品經理指南。

previous.excerpt: tw-rl is an advanced bookmarking and curation tool for twitter. Once connected, easily showcase tweet media or "loop" threads together. Use cases: portfolio, blog, mood board, inspiration gallery.
previous.title: tw-rl - Curate Twitter. Save and organize tweets or threads

localize.description: tw-rl是一款先进的twitter书签和策划工具。一旦连接起来，就可以轻松地展示tweet媒体或将线程 "循环 "在一起。使用案例：组合、博客、心情板、灵感库。
localize.tagline: 策划Twitter。保存和组织推文或线程

localize.description: tw-rl是一款先進的twitter書籤和策劃工具。一旦連接起來，就可以輕鬆地展示tweet媒體或將線程 "循環 "在一起。使用案例：組合、博客、心情板、靈感庫。
localize.tagline: 策劃Twitter。保存和組織推文或線程
